name: Alexa1 Music
description: Deploy Alexa music on Railway. Make sure to star the project.

OWNER_ID.description: The user ID(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as an owner. Multiple values should be separated with a space.

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: A name for your music bot.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram session. Get it from here: @Session_Generator_Robot.

github.description: Please enter your GitHub token here to install the app on Heroku.

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: If you don't know this, leave it as it is

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your log group ID. Add your bot and promote it as an admin with full rights! Use only a group. Please don't use a channel ID.
